abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes aerial views of Apple's data center in North Carolina, where it is building something; relationships between science fiction and today's technology; and a start-up company from the founder of Delicious.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Patent Wars and Tagging People
